name: Dungeon Stooge of the Weak Lord Badaxe
name_original: Dungeon Stooge of the Weak Lord Badaxe
description:
Created for Game Dev Network's Fig Jam, theme: Hidden Secrets

Dungeon Stooge of the Weak Lord Badaxe puts you in the other side's shoes - place the treasure around the dungeon, but don't get caught doing it! If you do, your secret and your boss's secrets are ruined!
